text: Yamunotri District is newly proposed district to split from Uttarkashi district, Uttarakhand, India.The area of this proposed district is 2839 sq km and population of this district is 138,559. == Tehsils == * Purola * Mori * Barkot == Blocks == * Three == Religious places == Yamunotri Temple and Ashram * Yamunotri Temple == References == Category:Proposed districts of Uttarakhand
title: Yamunotri district
